creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominately red coat with a blue inner lining; decorated with black, blue, gold, and green embroidery; embroidered designs include floral and plant motifs similar to paisley; coat's front is open; black embroidery borders coat's bottom, coat's front opening, and end of sleeves; sleeves continue straight out from shoulder; sides of coat at bottom have 12" slits; neck opening is circular with opening at front; tie threads at each side of front opening 13 1/2" from coat's top
title: Quilted coat
